game_description: This is an interesting VR sports competitive game. You play as a gorilla. The locomotion is inspired by Gorilla Tag. You can run, jump, and hit the ball using only your hands. The rules are the same as football (soccer). This game is free, and you can play with other players.
review_1: W game but glitchy but over all w
review_2: I love the idea of the game and I think it’s really great and every time I score I get really excited ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
review_4: The game’s basically like gtag it evolved to fun then toxic then fun you should make a report button and mute button
review_5: You get to meet up with other people and play soccer
